effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Holder's Speed is halved. Negates all Ground-type immunities, and makes Flying-types take neutral damage from Ground-type moves. Arena Trap. Spikes, and Toxic Spikes affect the holder.
effect_entries.effect: Held: Decreases the holder's Speed by 50%.  If the holder is Flying or has Levitate, it takes regular damage from Ground attacks and is suspectible to Spikes and Toxic Spikes.

flavor_text_entries.text:
持たせると　素早さが　さがる。
ひこうタイプや　ふゆう　ポケモンは
じめん技が　当たってしまう。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It lowers Speed and allows Ground-type
moves to hit Flying-type and levitating holders.

Riduce la Velocità e rende vulnerabili
alle mosse di tipo Terra se chi ce l’ha è
di tipo Volante o ha l’abilità Levitazione.

En combate, esta concha desechada sirve para
que un Pokémon se cambie por otro que no esté
combatiendo.

Ein Item zum Tragen. Macht Pokémon des Typs
Flug oder mit der Fähigkeit Schwebe anfällig für
Boden-Attacken. Senkt den Initiative-Wert.

Objet à tenir. Réduit la Vitesse. Rend les porteurs
de type Vol, ainsi que ceux en lévitation,
sensibles aux capacités de type Sol.

지니게 하면 스피드가 떨어진다.
비행타입이나 부유포켓몬은
땅 기술에 맞아 버린다.

もたせると　すばやさが　さがる。
ひこうタイプや　ふゆう　ポケモンは
じめんわざが　あたって　しまう。

It makes Flying-type and levitating
holders susceptible to Ground moves.
